sql.statement: CREATE TABLE conf_lib_version(bmu TEXT,concept TEXT,version_id TEXT,CONSTRAINT PK_conf_lib_version PRIMARY KEY (bmu, concept));

CREATE TABLE data_align( account_number TEXT,account_name TEXT,address TEXT,city TEXT,state TEXT,country TEXT,zip TEXT,phone TEXT,concept TEXT,type TEXT,bmu TEXT,lat REAL,lng REAL,distance REAL,CONSTRAINT PK_data_align PRIMARY KEY (account_number));

CREATE TABLE eval_book(perform_id TEXT,version_id TEXT,book_id TEXT,answer_type TEXT,point_value INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,deduct_point INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,value0 TEXT,value1 TEXT,value2 TEXT,CONSTRAINT PK_eval_book PRIMARY KEY (perform_id, version_id, book_id),CONSTRAINT FK_eval_book_eval_perform FOREIGN KEY (perform_id)REFERENCES eval_perform(perform_id) ,CONSTRAINT FK_eval_book_eval_perform FOREIGN KEY (perform_id)REFERENCES eval_perform(perform_id) ,CONSTRAINT FK_eval_book_lib_book FOREIGN KEY (version_id, book_id)REFERENCES lib_book(version_id, book_id) );

CREATE TABLE eval_perform(perform_id TEXT,bmu TEXT,concept TEXT,version_id TEXT,account_number TEXT,create_date DATETIME,visit_date DATETIME,visit_type TEXT,day_part TEXT,score INTEGER,rating TEXT,address TEXT,city TEXT,state TEXT,country TEXT,lock_date DATETIME,verify_date DATETIME,timezone REAL,server_create_date DATETIME,server_verify_date DATETIME,status TEXT,verified INTEGER,user_id TEXT,user_seq_id INTEGER,first_name TEXT,last_name TEXT,perform_type TEXT,source TEXT,app_version TEXT,begin_time TEXT,end_time TEXT,receipt_number TEXT,receipt_img_url TEXT,CONSTRAINT PK_eval_perform PRIMARY KEY (perform_id),CONSTRAINT FK_eval_perform_user_access FOREIGN KEY (user_id)REFERENCES user_access(user_id) ,CONSTRAINT FK_eval_perform_user_access FOREIGN KEY (user_id)REFERENCES user_access(user_id) ,CONSTRAINT FK_eval_perform_lib_versions FOREIGN KEY (version_id)REFERENCES lib_versions(version_id) );

CREATE TABLE lib_book(version_id TEXT,book_id TEXT,bmu TEXT,concept TEXT,root_id TEXT,parent_id TEXT,ancestor_ids TEXT,desc0 TEXT,desc1 TEXT,point_value INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,answer_type TEXT,drive_children INTEGER,parent_driven INTEGER,children_count INTEGER,validation_type TEXT,validation_rule TEXT,value_list TEXT,data_level INTEGER,display_id TEXT,display_order INTEGER,data_type TEXT,CONSTRAINT PK_lib_book PRIMARY KEY (version_id, book_id),CONSTRAINT FK_lib_book_lib_versions FOREIGN KEY (version_id)REFERENCES lib_versions(version_id) );
CREATE TABLE trans_book(book_id TEXT,version_id TEXT,language_code TEXT,desc0 TEXT,desc1 TEXT,CONSTRAINT PK_trans_book PRIMARY KEY (book_id, version_id, language_code));

CREATE TABLE lib_versions(version_id TEXT,bmu TEXT,concept TEXT,notes TEXT,create_by TEXT,create_date DATETIME,modify_by TEXT,modify_date DATETIME,CONSTRAINT PK_lib_versions PRIMARY KEY (version_id));
CREATE INDEX IX_lib_book_bmu_concept ON lib_book (bmu ASC, concept ASC);

CREATE TABLE coupons(coupon_id TEXT,lib_coupon_id TEXT,product_id TEXT,product_name TEXT,coupon_code TEXT,actual_price NUMERIC,original_price NUMERIC,savings NUMERIC,discount_type TEXT,effective_date DATETIME,expire_date DATETIME,image_url TEXT,desc1 TEXT,desc2 TEXT,desc3 TEXT,discount INTEGER,brand TEXT,create_date DATETIME,category TEXT,active NUMERIC,push_date DATETIME,used NUMERIC,used_date DATETIME,used_place TEXT,account_no TEXT,lat NUMERIC,lng NUMERIC,perform_id TEXT,complaint_id TEXT,udts INTEGER,CONSTRAINT PK_lib_coupons PRIMARY KEY (coupon_id));
CREATE TABLE trans_coupons(lib_coupon_id TEXT,version_id TEXT,language_code TEXT,desc1 TEXT,desc2 TEXT,desc3 TEXT,CONSTRAINT PK_trans_coupons PRIMARY KEY (lib_coupon_id, version_id, language_code));

CREATE TABLE device_udts(device_token TEXT,data_type TEXT,profile_id TEXT,udts INTEGER,update_date DATETIME,CONSTRAINT PK_device_udts PRIMARY KEY (device_token, data_type),CONSTRAINT FK_device_udts_user_profile FOREIGN KEY (profile_id)REFERENCES user_profile(profile_id));

CREATE TABLE user_profile(profile_id TEXT,password TEXT,email TEXT,first_name TEXT,last_name TEXT,gender TEXT,age TEXT,dob DATETIME,phone TEXT,favorites TEXT,day_part TEXT,create_date DATETIME,device_type TEXT,device_system TEXT,active NUMERIC,app_id TEXT,CONSTRAINT PK_user_profile PRIMARY KEY (profile_id));
CREATE TABLE conf_general(param_name TEXT, param_value TEXT, param_desc TEXT, update_time DATETIME, CONSTRAINT PK_app_config PRIMARY KEY (param_name));
CREATE TABLE sync_data (sync_id TEXT,type TEXT,data_id TEXT,data TEXT,format TEXT,status TEXT,create_date datetime,CONSTRAINT PK_sync_data PRIMARY KEY (sync_id));
